snippet: MYRUS--Donald Richard. September 22, 1927-April 26, 2016. Author, editor died peacefully at home. Survived by wife Joyce, son Richard and his wife Alison, son Noah and his wife Holly and grandchildren Elizabeth, Carolyn, Parker and Lucinda. Also by a brother and two sisters. A Memorial Celebration was held June 11th on the East End of Long Island. 1/3
lead_paragraph: MYRUS--Donald Richard. September 22, 1927-April 26, 2016. Author, editor died peacefully at home. Survived by wife Joyce, son Richard and his wife Alison, son Noah and his wife Holly and grandchildren Elizabeth, Carolyn, Parker and Lucinda. Also by a brother and two sisters. A Memorial Celebration was held June 11th on the East End of Long Island. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  MYRUS, DONALD RICHARD
